DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to to compare two bowel preparation regimens of patients who will undergo colonoscopy, in terms of quality of bowel preparation and in terms of patient satisfaction.
DOC.brief_title: Comparison of Bowel Cleansing Regimens Prior to Colonoscopy
